name: geo-data-exchange
description: Transform a GPX or Leaflet track to GeoJSON

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test-coverage && mkdir dist && cp src/index.js dist/index.js
scripts.release-patch: npm run version:bump-patch --silent && npm run build
scripts.release-minor: npm run version:bump-minor --silent && npm run build
scripts.release-major: npm run version:bump-major --silent && npm run build
scripts.version:add:
echo "/* Version: $(npm run version:extract --silent) , Build time: $(date -u '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') UTC */
$(cat dist/index.js)" > dist/index.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'

author: Alex Cojocaru
